articles.title: Celtics secure No. 2 seed in the East, embrace what is coming next - NBC Sports Boston
articles.description: The Celtics played it straight down the stretch and were rewarded with the No. 2 seed in the East. As Chris Forsberg writes, a potential matchup with Brooklyn didn't alter their plans, a sign of the team's confidence in itself.
articles.content:
The Boston Celtics made the right decision to push for the No. 2 seed during Sunday nights regular-season finale in Memphis.
Boston has been the best team in basketball for the past three months and… [+3455 chars]

articles.title: Giants' Heliot Ramos has great response to Joey Bart reunion in MLB debut - NBC Sports
articles.description: Heliot Ramos was reunited with an old friend in his MLB debut on Sunday.
articles.content: There were likely a lot of emotions running through Heliot Ramos mind when he entered the Giants clubhouse as a member of the team for the first time on Sunday, but nothing can help calm nerves like … [+1874 chars]
